quest.name: Forever Blowing Bubbles
journal:
Zukin seeks to test your matchmaking skills.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Help the male striped ray launch bubbles at the female striped ray.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Mating season for striped rays is upon us. Their courtship rituals are long and complex, and begin with the male propelling a stream of sweet-smelling bubbles at an eligible female.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: However, the females often reject attempts to impress them. The males become despondent as a result, so the ray handlers must encourage them to keep trying until they find a mate.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Over by Sui–no–Sato is a male ray who is reluctant to continue with the rituals. Perhaps you could assist his trainer?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Search for the female striped ray. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target the female striped ray and launch bubbles with [???] / [???].

dialogue.name: ATTENDANT02991
dialogue.text: Oh, what a pity! That was a fine attempt, but she's just not interested. She seems to turn away all the males though, not just our little friend here.

dialogue.name: ATTENDANT02991
dialogue.text: That was very nicely done, but he might need to try a few more times before she pays him any attention.

dialogue.name: ATTENDANT02991
dialogue.text: Look at that! This is the first time I've seen her show so much interest! She's ignored every other male until now.

dialogue.name: ATTENDANT02991
dialogue.text: Well, it looks like she's had enough for now. We'd better call it a day as well.

dialogue.name: ATTENDANT02991
dialogue.text: Our young friend here has made a lot of progress. His technique is slowly improving. Perhaps it won't be long before he finds a match!

dialogue.name: ATTENDANT02991
dialogue.text: Oh, are you here to help? I have spent all day training him, but he has become sullen and uncooperative. I think a fresh approach might do him some good. Would you like to try?

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: It would appear that the ray responded well to your instruction. The handler tells me that if he perseveres, he will find a mate sooner or later.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Striped rays are essential to our way of life, but pairing the males and females can be a little troublesome. In most cases, the males must attempt the mating ritual over and over before they succeed.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Since you have a knack for this, we may benefit from your help in the days to come.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The male stares into the distance. With the female gone, he seems at a loss.

dialogue.name: ATTENDANT02991
dialogue.text: We will stay here and continue practicing. I am sure that Zukin will be interested to hear how everything went. Fare you well!
